fields.name: projectId
fields.doc: Project identifier. Null if unknown or the user is not enrolled in a project.

fields.name: userId
fields.doc: User Identifier created during the enrolment.

fields.name: sourceId
fields.doc: Unique identifier associated with the source.

type.name: FitbitSleepStage
type.doc: Fitbit 'stages' sleep data as defined at https://dev.fitbit.com/build/reference/web-api/sleep/.

fields.name: dateTime
fields.doc: ISO 6801 formatted local date time of device (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss).

fields.name: timeReceived
fields.doc: Time that the data was received from the Fitbit API (seconds since the Unix Epoch).

fields.name: duration
fields.doc: Duration at this sleep characteristic in seconds.

fields.name: level

type.name: FitbitSleepStageLevel
type.doc: Level of sleep as computed by Fitbit.

fields.doc: Level of sleep as computed by Fitbit.
